novel.author: Audrey Niffenegger
novel.summary: A love story between a man with a genetic disorder that causes him to involuntarily time travel and the woman who loves him unconditionally.

novel.title_name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
novel.author: Douglas Adams
novel.summary: A humorous Sci-Fi adventure following the misadventures of Arthur Dent, a man who finds himself on an intergalactic journey after the Earth is destroyed.

novel.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
novel.summary: An epic fantasy trilogy following the hobbit Frodo Baggins as he embarks on a quest to destroy the One Ring and defeat the Dark Lord Sauron.

novel.author: Suzanne Collins
novel.summary: A dystopian novel set in a future where young people are forced to fight to the death in a televised competition.

novel.author: Margaret Atwood
novel.summary: A dystopian novel set in a future where women are stripped of their rights and forced into reproductive servitude.

novel.author: Alexandre Dumas
novel.summary: A historical fiction novel about a man who seeks revenge on those who wrongfully imprisoned him.

novel.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
novel.summary: A classic American novel about the excesses of the Jazz Age and the pursuit of the American Dream.

novel.author: Dr. Evelyn Carter
novel.summary: A brilliant physicist delves into the mysteries of quantum mechanics, leading her to uncover a groundbreaking theory that could change the world.

novel.author: Kai Chen
novel.summary: A young warrior must protect the last surviving dragon from a powerful sorcerer seeking to harness its ancient magic.
